Writer: David Benullo, Kanika Dhillon (dialogue), Kanika Dhillon (screenplay), Niranjan Iyengar (dialogue), Shah Rukh Khan (screenplay), Mushtaq Sheikh (screenplay), Anubhav Sinha (story), Anubhav Sinha, Rajshri Sudhakar (Dialogue Writer: Telugu)
Title: Ra.One
Actors: Shah Rukh Khan, Arjun Rampal, Kareena Kapoor, Shahana Goswami
Plot: A computer game character takes on physical form to destroy a player who nearly beat him but quit the game in between.
